title: Add phone, address, and business hours to visible site contact areas

requirements.text: Update the public-facing footer "Visit Us" block to display the cafe's address, phone number, and business hours (in addition to the existing location text), using the editable homepage content `contactInfo` values when available and falling back to the existing defaults when not.

quotes: add phone and address and hours

acceptanceCriteria: Footer shows the full address from `content.contactInfo.address` (or the current default address) as readable text.
Footer shows the phone number from `content.contactInfo.phone` (or the current default phone) on its own dedicated line.
Footer shows business hours from `content.contactInfo.hours` (or the current default hours), rendered as multiple lines when the value contains newlines.
No existing footer links (Menu, Contact Us, Admin) are removed or broken.

requirements.text: Ensure the admin Editor "Contact Info" tab allows editing and saving all three fields—address, phone, and business hours—without overwriting unrelated contact/location copy, and persists these updates via the existing homepage content save flow.

quotes: add phone and address and hours

acceptanceCriteria: Editor provides inputs for: address (single-line or textarea), phone (single-line), and hours (textarea supporting newlines).
Saving from the editor updates `HomePageContent.contactInfo.address`, `.phone`, and `.hours` and the values remain after page reload.
Editing one field (e.g., phone) does not erase/replace the other fields (e.g., address/hours).

requirements.text: Verify that the public Contact & Location section renders address, phone, and hours from backend-provided `HomePageContent.contactInfo` and that each value is displayed in the correct dedicated UI area (address card, contact card, hours card) without any field overwriting another.

quotes: add phone and address and hours

acceptanceCriteria: When `content.contactInfo.address` is present, it is displayed in the Location card and does not get replaced by phone/hours content.
When `content.contactInfo.phone` is present, it is displayed in the Contact card as a dedicated phone line.
When `content.contactInfo.hours` is present, it is split by newline and displayed as multiple lines in the Business Hours card.
If any of the three fields are missing, the section falls back to the existing default values without rendering errors.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI components must be composed, not modified).
Do not modify files listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, Internet Identity hooks).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`; only add `backend/migration.mo` changes if stable state shape must change.
nonGoals: Changing the admin authentication flow or admin code.
Adding new social links or changing existing CTA buttons.
